ygData.subject: Cut and Paste form EQ'Lizer
ygData.msgSnippet: James....I also am getting a little bored with my level 19 Barbarian Warrior.  One of the reasons, I guess, that I started the Bard.  I do think that Verant
ygData.messageBody:
James....I also am getting a little bored with my level 19 Barbarian Warrior. One of the reasons, I guess, that I started the Bard. I do think that Verant has overlooked us slightly. When I played Realm, the warrior on there could buy mana and cast spells. Agreed, they didn't work as well as the mages did, but we still could have the basics. I would like to see Verant come up with another plan. Perhaps some sort of magic skill, so at the very least, we could gate and cast healing on ourselves.

Leri
